Rubber gloves can be used as a protective layer for your hands when working with harsh chemicals or cleaning products.
Rubber gloves can be used as a natural rubber band alternative. Simply cut off the fingertips and use the remaining material to hold things together.
Rubber gloves can be used as a natural stress ball. Simply squeeze the gloves to relieve tension and stress.
Rubber gloves can be used as a natural insulation material. Simply wrap them around a pipe or other cold surface to keep it warm.
Rubber gloves can be used as a natural soundproofing material. Simply slip them over the ends of doors and windows to reduce noise.
